attributes.action: force the BBC to remove Jonathan Legard from their Formula One's commentary team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the BBC's coverage of the 2009 FIA Formula One season is superior to anything in the past, the quality of the commentary from Jonathan Legard is atrocious. He is obviously not an expert on the sport and seems unable to follow what is happening, even when it is presented to him on a screen in front of him.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
